summary: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.
cast: Akio Ôtsuka|Atsuko Tanaka|Kôichi Yamadera|Tamio Ôki|Yutaka Nakano|Naoto Takenaka|Gou Aoba|Eisuke Asakura|Yuzuru Fujimoto|Emiko Fuku|Masao Harada|Minoru Hirano|Hiroaki Hirata|Katsunosuke Hori|Sukekiyo Kameyama|Eriko Kigawa|Hiroyuki Kinosha|Shuji Kishida|Ken'ichi Mochizuki|Sumi Mutoh|Ryûji Nakagi|Yasushi Niko|Yu Sugimoto|Fumihiko Tachiki|Masaki Terasoma|Akino Watanabe|Makoto Yasumura|Robert Axelrod|Laura Bailey|Richard Cansino|Joey D'Auria|Erik Davies|Loy Edge|Richard Epcar|Sandy Fox|Crispin Freeman|Barbara Goodson|Kyle Hebert|Karen Huie|William Frederick Knight|Steve Kramer|Jim Lau|Sherry Lynn|Michael McCarty|Michael McConnohie|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Bob Papenbrook|Joe Romersa|Yoshiko Sakakibara|Fred Sanders|Kevin Seymour|Stephanie Sheh|Roger Craig Smith|John Snyder|Ellyn Stern|Doug Stone|Terrence Stone|David Vincent|Travis Willingham
title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
